mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_INFO ( COLLECT_TIME, SEQ, MOVIE_RANK, MOVIE_NM, SCORE, MOVIE_RESERVE, OPEN_DAY, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES( #{collectTime}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM MOVIE_INFO A WHERE A.COLLECT_TIME = #{collectTime}), #{movieRank}, #{movieNm}, #{score}, #{movieReserve}, #{openDay}, #{regId}, SYSDATE, #{chgId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE_INFO WHERE COLLECT_TIME LIKE #{collectTime} || '%' ORDER BY MOVIE_RANK ASC
